reviewText:
This is a fantastic DVD if you are interested in more of the bizarre teachings by the Jehovah's Witnesses, such as why they preach from door to door, and why they believe so devoutly. It's also really good for a laugh.

You can request a copy for free, but then the Witnesses have your address and will send people to your home to talk to you / study with you, so if you want to see this DVD without giving your address up, it's a small price to pay (especially if you have Prime).

Request this free from one of Jehovahs witnesses you can use the contact me form at jw org for this

OR to watch other sign language videos like this

go to jw dot org
on the bottom right click on "watch sign language videos"
you can choose whatever sign language you prefer
This DVD is made available free of charge.  Please do not purcahse these.  You can download this as well as others for free ([...]).  You can also contact the local kingdom hall to get a copy.

We rate this 5 stars. A timely video for deaf and hearing. Stand Firm in Troublesome Times/Boldly Witnessing Despite Opposition helps us to see we are living in the last of the last days. It teaches us what we can do to live through these troubled times on into the future. With perfect hearing and eye-sight and lasting peace on earth. You'll love it.
